InstructionData.Title: CentrifugeCntrl
InstructionData.Author: Orpheus2468
InstructionData.Instructions:
define Centrifuge 1238905683 alias VKE r0 alias VKE2 r1 alias RPM r2 alias StressReal r3 alias OutputCount r4 alias OutputCountZ1 r5 Init: s db ClearMemory 1 Main: s db Throttle 0 s db CombustionLimiter 0
s db Open 1 l OutputCountZ1 db ExportCount yield yield yield yield l OutputCount db ExportCount sub VKE OutputCount OutputCountZ1 seq VKE VKE 0 l RPM db Rpm sle VKE2 RPM 1 and VKE VKE VKE2 l StressReal db Stress seq VKE2 StressReal 0 and VKE VKE VKE2 beq VKE 1 Start
j Main
Start: s db Open 0 s db ClearMemory 1 l StressReal db Stress sle VKE StressReal 90 mul VKE VKE 10 s db Throttle VKE yield l VKE db Stress sub VKE VKE StressReal slt VKE VKE 0 l RPM db Rpm sge VKE2 RPM 100 and VKE VKE VKE2 beq VKE 1 Speed bgt StressReal 95 Main j Start
Speed: s db Throttle 100 l StressReal db Stress sle VKE StressReal 1 mul VKE VKE 100 s db CombustionLimiter VKE beq VKE 100 Running bgt StressReal 95 Main j Speed
Running: l VKE db ImportCount sge VKE VKE 601 lb VKE2 Centrifuge Throttle Minimum seq VKE2 VKE2 100 and VKE VKE VKE2 beq VKE 1 Main
l VKE db Stress bge VKE 95 Main j Running
